Description:
We are seeking a Sales Transport Executive to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for managing the sales process and operations within the transportation industry. This position offers a great opportunity for a driven, results-oriented individual looking to advance their career.ResponsibilitiesIdentify new sales opportunities through market research and lead generation
Develop sales strategies and plans to achieve business targets
Work closely with customers to identify their transportation needs and provide them with solutions that meet their requirements
Conduct sales presentations and negotiate contracts with prospective clients
Collaborate with other departments to ensure smooth operations in regards to customer service, logistics and finance
Build and maintain positive relationships with clients to ensure repeat business and customer satisfaction
Analyze and report on sales data to track progress and improve performanceSkills
Skills: The ideal candidate should have a strong sales background with proven experience in the logistics and transportation sector.

Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field
Minimum of 5 years of experience in sales and marketing,
preferably in the transportation industry
Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Strong negotiating and problem-solving skills
Ability to work independently and in a team environment
Knowledge of transportation management systems and logistics processes
Willingness to travel as needed and work flexible hours as required.
